#Instructions for using Greenhorn

= Using =

./greenhorn

Displays interactive help for regular Python commands, such as . __builtins__

./greenhorn gtk

Displays interactive help for the 'gtk' module.

= Details =

#~ import any modules you want to inspect
{{{
import sys,twitter,inspect,os,fedora
}}}
#~ global modules
{{{
import gtk
}}}
